title: FS t206 Uzit PSA 4 Harry Steinfeldt
author: JamesGallo

posts.post_title: FS t206 Uzit PSA 4 Harry Steinfeldt
posts.post_content:
Here is a chance at a rare back without having to deal with an auction setting.

My ebay id is jgallo and many know me here (although I have no been around much lately)

Soild card and a higher graded Uzit with a nice back. Card is pending.

Price is $5000 shipped overnight express mail.  Check or money order on this one.  

Will consider trade for Boston Store Cards I need.  Any questions please let me know.

James G
